alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 8:50PM EDT until May 05 at 10:27AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. For the Kennebec River...including Skowhegan, North Sidney, Augusta, Hallowell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 35,000.0 cfs, Flooding begins at campgrounds in Skowhegan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EDT Thursday the flow was 38,000.0 cfs. - Recent Activity...The maximum river flow in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM EDT Thursday was 38,000.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 28,170.0 cfs Sunday morning. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
